member.param: Optional client identifier for the transaction.
member.returns: Transaction execution result. If successful, returns results array. If aborted (due to watched keys changed), returns aborted status.

member.summary: Gets the base URL of the Synap server.

member.summary: Gets the authentication token for requests.

member.summary: Gets the maximum number of retries for failed requests.

member.param: The base URL of the Synap server.
member.exception: Thrown when the base URL is null or empty.

member.summary: Creates a copy of this configuration with the specified maximum retries.
